seo.title: Contact Us - ShapeShyft
seo.description: Get in touch with the ShapeShyft team. We're here to help with any questions about our API platform.

title: Contact Us
subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

email.title: Email Us
email.description: The best way to reach us is via email. We typically respond within 24-48 hours on business days.

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.description: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 1-2 business days. For urgent issues, please include 'URGENT' in your subject line.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: For API issues, bugs, or technical questions, include your project ID and any relevant error messages in your email.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Many common questions are answered in our documentation. Check there first for quick solutions.
